Emmaus Alpha Arbutin Brightening Serum

Brand: Emmaus Beauty

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Alpha-Arbutin, Chondrus Crispus (Seaweed) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Dehydroacetate
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
